page.title: 19HEATHROW AIRPORT
page.content: HEATHROW HAS 4 PASSENGER TERMINALS AND 1 CARGO AREA. TERMINAL 1 IS USED MAINLY FOR DOMESTIC FLIGHTS. THE MAIN OPERATORS ARE BRITSH AIRWAYS,BRITISH MIDLAND AIRWAYS AND AER LINGUS. TERMINAL 2 COVERS MAINLY EUROPEAN FLIGHTS.MOST EUROPEAN AIRLINES USE THIS AREA,FOR EXAMPLE AIR FRANCE,LUFTHANSA,OLYMPIC AIRWAYS ETC. TERMINAL 3 IS USED FOR INTERNATIONAL FLIGHTS.THE WORLDS AIRLINES USE THIS TERMINAL,FOR EXAMPLE PAN-AM,AIR CANADA,QANTAS,TWA,JAPAN AIRLINES ETC. TERMINAL 4 TO BE OPENED EARLY IN 1986 WILL BE USED FOR BOTH EUROPEAN AND INTERNATIONAL FLIGHTS. THE MAIN OPERATORS WILL BE BRITSH AIRWAYS FOR CONCORDE AND OTHER FLIGHTS,AND KLM-ROYAL DUTCH AIRLINES. THE CARGO AREA IS SOUTH OF THE MAIN AIRPORT AND CAN TAKE UP TO /CONT..
